About Us

Data Society is a community of data experts and enthusiasts sharing knowledge, insights, and issues online and in person.

Dmitri Adler, Founder

Dmitri is a former investment banker and hedge fund analyst. Throughout his finance career he advised on over $7 billion of mergers and acquisitions and has invested over $300 million. As an investor he experienced the advantage of data driven-decision making through superior investment outcomes and realized the impact that better information can have on decision-making. Because of this, he embarked on a mission to democratize data science methods and bring the tools of data driven decision-making to people who want to improve the quality of their decisions, careers, and lives.

Merav Yuravlivker, Head of Recruitment and Outreach

Merav’s instructional background has ranged from teaching special education elementary students how to read in New York City to teaching adults how to ace the GREs in Washington, DC. In the past three years, she has been nationally ranked as a top tier GRE instructor and has also recruited teachers from all over the Americas to dedicate their time to maintaining high academic standards for students. Throughout her teaching and recruiting career, Merav has used data analysis to propel her classroom to reach significant academic gains and target high value markets. She is passionate about integrating data science tools in the education field in order to create data-driven instruction that works.
